ComicInfo.Title: Jailbreak
ComicInfo.Summary:
A man held in the relative comfort of a POW camp by giant, grotesque aliens is determined to escape or die trying. Can he convince his broken-willed fellow prisoners to snap out of it and join him?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Guiu Vilanova & Vinicius Andrade | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Jonathan Lau & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Guiu Vilanova | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Lau | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 6 |
